name: TV Sitcoms Online Quiz | Mixture: Comedy | 10 Questions

questions.text: On 'The Facts of Life', what was the name of the exchange student from Australia?
questions.explanation:
Pippa.

	She was played by Sherrie Austin who later had a Country hit with the song 'Never Been Kissed'

questions.text: Which of the following was NOT a direct spinoff of 'All in the Family'?
questions.explanation:
Good Times.

	Good Times was a spin off of Maude.

questions.text: On the 'Munsters', what was Eddie's middle name?
Who did not live next door to the Bunker's on 'All in the Family'?
questions.explanation:
Stretch.

	Only Stretch Cunningham didn't live next door, Gloria moved in the George Jefferson's house where she had a child named Joey.

questions.text: On 'Family Ties', what was Elyse Keaton's occupation?
On 'Happy Days', how many children did Mr. and Mrs. Cunningham have when the series began?
questions.explanation:
3.

	They were Richie, Joanie, and Chuck. Chuck vanished without explanation after 11 episodes. In the future, this disappearing character issue would be referred to as 'Chuck Cunningham Syndrome'.

questions.text: Which of the following songs was NOT used for the theme of 'The Drew Carey Show'?
What high school did Al Bundy attend on 'Married with Children'?
What amusement park is visited by both 'The Brady Bunch' and 'The Partridge Family'?
On 'I Love Lucy', What is Ethel Mertz's maiden name?
